content.text: Here is the downstairs room. The rooms's only furnishings are a plain wooden cabinet and a sink on the western wall. The front door is closed. There appears to be a flight of stairs leading to the second floor.
The front door is closed.
There appears to be a flight of stairs leading to the second floor.
The plain wooden cabinet stares back into your soul. It might be hiding something from you.
The doors of the cabinet are open, you spot a pile of yarn in the cabinet. Perhaps it was hiding this from you.
The cabinet is already open.

altContent.text: You open the squeaky cabinet doors.

content.text: You close the cabinet doors.
You take the pile of yarn.
The sink is rusted and beyond disrepair.
You see a faint glint coming from the sink drain.
"19" seems to be written under the sink. Upon closer inspection, the second half of the message seems to be rubbed out.

You carefully fish out the object that was occasionally glinting. It was a iron key! As you were picking up the key, you accidentally dropped the magnet on a string down the sink hole. How unfortunate.
The door appears to be locked. There is probably a key somewhere around here.

altContent.text: The door appears to be unlocked.

content.text: You unlocked the door with the key.

altContent.text: You close the door and lock the door with the key.

content.text: The flight of stairs lead upstairs.
You go up the flight of stairs.
You go up the flight of stairs.
Here is the upstairs room. The room is only decorated with a bare bed and a small safe in the corner of the room. Additionally, there is the flight of stairs you just came up from.
The bed is neither too hard nor too soft. If a little girl were to stumble upon this bed in the woods, it would be just right.
There appears to be a message hastily scribbled on the bedframe in red. The message reads "84". The first half of the message seems to be blotted out with more red paint.
The safe is locked. It seems that the safe is locked with a 4 digit code.
There appears to be a single ring magnet in the safe.
You input "1984" into the safe and you hear a loud click.

altContent.text: You have already unlocked the safe, entering the code again won't unlock a secret drawer in the safe.

content.text: You take the ring magnet.
You input "1984" into the safe and you hear a loud click.

altContent.text: You have already unlocked the safe, entering the code again won't unlock a secret drawer in the safe.

content.text: The flight of stairs lead back downstairs.
You go down the flight of stairs.
You go down the flight of stairs.
The ring magnet fits snugly around your finger. You could possibly lose this down a drain pipe.
You carefully thread the yarn around the magnet, making a magnet on a string.
Some yarn that was probably used to knit some ugly sweater, definitely not used in senario testing or something.
You carefully thread the yarn around the magnet, making a magnet on a string.
You tied a magnet to a piece of yarn. You can probably catch some magnetic fish with this, if they exist.
You dont see anything resembling anything like it.
There is nothing interesting there.
There is nothing interesting there.
There is nothing interesting there.

content.text: Your request to use something, presumably on something else, made no sense to me. Perhaps you're trying to use an item you don't have, or use an item on a target that doesn't exist, or perhaps those objects simply aren't intended to interact in that way.

verbs.usage: Use the object on its own or on another object.
